# seasonal differencing
adjusted = value - value[-12]
Listing 14.36: Example of seasonal diﬀerencing.
This can be performed systematically for the entire training dataset. It also means that the
ﬁrst year of observations must be discarded as we have no prior year of data to diﬀerence them
with. The difference() function below will diﬀerence a provided dataset with a provided
oﬀset, called the diﬀerence order, e.g. 12 for one year of months prior.
